captions.text:
-Take it easy on the open road, son.
-Dad!
I don't drive like that anymore.

-You're not gonna drive, are ya? 
-# And the night... #

-I can't afford to miss my...
-# The night is yours alone... #

-Hey, I know this road.
-# Hang on... #

The result
of that preliminary breath test

indicates that your breath
contains alcohol.
Only a little bit, I think.
# Now it's time to sing along

# When your day is night
Hold on... #

-Go on, jump in!
-Nah, she'll be right.

They're the ones that have to live
with it and that's the real tragedy.

# Feel like letting go
Hold on

# If you think
you've had too much... #

-You shouldn't be driving.
-# Of this life... #
# If you feel like you're alone

-# No, no, no... #
-Why isn't she coming with me?

-# The days and nights are long... #
-(SOBS) Oh, no.

# When you think
you've had too much... #
Hold on. Hold on really tight.

-# Sometimes... #
-Bend your knee. Hold on, Cathy.

title: TAC Campaign - 20 year Anniversary retrospective montage "Everybody Hurts" music by REM  TV ad

comments.text:
By far...the most high impact drinking and driving video montage...I takes 
alot to bring me to tears...the stupidness of impaired driving and the 
havoc it causes...That commercial is from Australia, TAC...Transport 
Accident Commission. The Transport Accident Commission (TAC) is the 
statutory insurer of third-party personal liability (CTP insurance in other 
states) for road accidents in the State of Victoria, Australia. It was 
established under the Transport Accident Act 1986. For its part, the TAC 
funds television and billboards coupled with high-impact advertising...﻿

comments.author: Zeph

comments.text:
A five minute retrospective of the road safety campaigns produced by the 
TAC over the last 20 years have been compiled for this powerful message.

According to the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) 
33,561 people died in traffic crashes in 2012 in the United States (latest 
figures available), including an estimated 10,322 people who died in drunk 
driving crashes, accounting for 31% of all traffic deaths that year.

There are graphic recreations included, but it’s a message EVERYONE needs 
to see.


Read more at 
http://www.thisblewmymind.com/the-most-powerful-drunk-driving-ad-ever/#c6bzSTE4MO4qIDk8.99
﻿

comments.author: Kristian Henschel

comments.text:
Please Drive Safely This Holiday Season!!
 
Dear Brothers and Sisters,
Because we all love someone and we all care about each other, I think this 
is worth passing on to our children, our friends, our extended family and 
anyone else we care about. It is very difficult to watch but that is the 
intent. It is MORE difficult to live with.
  
A life is more valuable than a good time.
 
Warning, this video is like a kick in the stomach and will be upsetting.   
But watch the whole thing we all NEED to remember it.
 
This needs to be passed around to everyone who has the keys to a vehicle. 
This is perhaps one of the most intense commercials ever made. It is very 
moving and very life like. It has a very strong impact.
 
Please click on the link https://www.youtube.com/embed/Z2mf8DtWWd8  
 
All the best to you and your family,
Kent Gade

Director - Elks National Drug Program

& VictoriaLynn
Virginia's North District Drug Awareness Program Chair﻿
comments.author: VictoriaLynn Johnson

comments.text:
Cannabis or Alcohol in this video it shows both and other drugs too. I 
think your missing the point of the video. ANY mind altering drug including 
alcohol shouldn't be consumed and then drive. If Cannabis legal or not as 
with alcohol WILL kill just like a grenade... Just a matter of time if you 
drive. Let us all just think about that. I drink and still will however I 
do not or will not drive. I had to watch this video for a speeding ticket, 
and yes I did deserve the ticket I was going way too fast and its my fault, 
I am glad that I had to watch this video showing about using drugs, and 
alcohol during Christmas and driving what happens, however this should be 
year around. ﻿
